original_title: The Dream of the Dirty Woman
overview: A performance by Margo Lee Sherman, Christian DuPavillon, and Kenny Eisenstat based on a dream that Elka Schumann had about the French Revolution. Originally filmed in 16mm in Glover Vermont. Direction by Peter Schumann. The digital version was edited by DeeDee Halleck and Mary Feaster in 2019.
title: The Dream of the Dirty Woman
